languages.text: "Тело было изуродовано после смерти. Он был убит ударами хирургической точности, после чего ему вскрыли горло и слили кровь. И уже потом ему размозжили голову и попытались скрыть раны".

"The body was disfigured posthumously. They killed the mutant with surgical precision, before opening his throat and draining his blood. It wasn't until after the actual murder that they crushed his head and tried to cover up his wounds."
languages.original_text: "Тело было изуродовано после смерти. Он был убит ударами хирургической точности, после чего ему вскрыли горло и слили кровь. И уже потом ему размозжили голову и попытались скрыть раны".

traits.locale_text: "The body's disfigurement was posthumous. The mutant was killed with surgical precision, then they opened his throat and drained his blood. It wasn't until after the actual murder that they crushed his head and tried to cover up his wounds."

"The body's disfigurement was posthumous. The mutant was killed with surgical precision, then they opened his throat and drained his blood. It wasn't until after the actual murder that they crushed his head and tried to cover up his wounds."

"The body was disfigured posthumously. They killed the mutant with surgical precision, before opening his throat and draining his blood. It wasn't until after the actual murder that they crushed his head and tried to cover up his wounds."

"The body was disfigured posthumously. They killed the mutant with surgical precision, before opening his throat and draining his blood. It wasn't until after the actual murder that they crushed his head and tried to cover up his wounds."

languages.text: « La victime était déjà morte quand elle a été défigurée. L'assassin a tué le mutant avec une précision chirurgicale avant de lui ouvrir la gorge pour le vider de son sang. Ce n'est qu'après lui avoir réglé son compte que le coupable lui a défoncé le crâne et a tenté de maquiller ses blessures. »
languages.original_text: "The body was disfigured posthumously. They killed the mutant with surgical precision, before opening his throat and draining his blood. It wasn't until after the actual murder that they crushed his head and tried to cover up his wounds."

traits.locale_text: « La victime était déjà morte quand elle a été défigurée. L'assassin a tué le mutant avec une précision chirurgicale avant de lui ouvrir la gorge pour le vider de son sang. Ce n'est qu'après lui avoir réglé son compte que le coupable lui a défoncé le crâne et a tenté de maquiller ses blessures. »

languages.text: «El cuerpo se desfiguró de forma póstuma. Mataron al mutante con precisión quirúrgica antes de abrirle la garganta y drenar su sangre. Después del asesinato, aplastaron su cabeza y trataron de oscurecer sus heridas».
languages.original_text: "The body was disfigured posthumously. They killed the mutant with surgical precision, before opening his throat and draining his blood. It wasn't until after the actual murder that they crushed his head and tried to cover up his wounds."

traits.locale_text: «El cuerpo se desfiguró de forma póstuma. Mataron al mutante con precisión quirúrgica antes de abrirle la garganta y drenar su sangre. Después del asesinato, aplastaron su cabeza y trataron de oscurecer sus heridas».

languages.text: “尸体是在死后才被损毁的。凶手以外科手术般的精准操作杀死了这个变种人，之后割开了他的喉咙，放干了他的血。直到凶手死亡之后，他们才把他的头捣得稀巴烂，试图掩饰真正致命的伤口。”
languages.original_text: "The body was disfigured posthumously. They killed the mutant with surgical precision, before opening his throat and draining his blood. It wasn't until after the actual murder that they crushed his head and tried to cover up his wounds."

traits.locale_text: “尸体是在死后才被损毁的。凶手以外科手术般的精准操作杀死了这个变种人，之后割开了他的喉咙，放干了他的血。直到凶手死亡之后，他们才把他的头捣得稀巴烂，试图掩饰真正致命的伤口。”

languages.text: 「遺体は死後、傷つけられた。彼らは外科手術のように変異体を殺し、喉を切り開いて血を抜いた。頭を潰し、傷を隠そうとしたのは、実際に殺された後だった」
languages.original_text: "The body was disfigured posthumously. They killed the mutant with surgical precision, before opening his throat and draining his blood. It wasn't until after the actual murder that they crushed his head and tried to cover up his wounds."

traits.locale_text: 「遺体は死後、傷つけられた。彼らは外科手術のように変異体を殺し、喉を切り開いて血を抜いた。頭を潰し、傷を隠そうとしたのは、実際に殺された後だった」

languages.text: "Der Körper wurde posthum verstümmelt. Sie haben den Mutanten mit chirurgischer Präzision getötet, bevor sie ihm die Kehle durchtrennt haben, um ihn auszubluten. Erst nach dem eigentlichen Mord haben sie ihm den Schädel eingeschlagen und versucht, die Wunden zu vertuschen."
languages.original_text: "The body was disfigured posthumously. They killed the mutant with surgical precision, before opening his throat and draining his blood. It wasn't until after the actual murder that they crushed his head and tried to cover up his wounds."

traits.locale_text: "Der Körper wurde posthum verstümmelt. Sie haben den Mutanten mit chirurgischer Präzision getötet, bevor sie ihm die Kehle durchtrennt haben, um ihn auszubluten. Erst nach dem eigentlichen Mord haben sie ihm den Schädel eingeschlagen und versucht, die Wunden zu vertuschen."

languages.text: "Bedeninin biçimi, ölüm sonrasında bozulmuş. Mutantı cerrahi bir titizlikle öldürmüş. Ardından boğazını kesip tüm kanını akıtmış. Kafasını ezip yara izlerini kapamaya çalışması, cinayet sonrasında gerçekleşmiş."
languages.original_text: "The body was disfigured posthumously. They killed the mutant with surgical precision, before opening his throat and draining his blood. It wasn't until after the actual murder that they crushed his head and tried to cover up his wounds."
